definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Today girls are going for the women's individual all-around final.
sentences.chinese: 今天女孩子們要爲個人全能拼搏了。

sentences.english: A frend is going to visit a girl you know well.
sentences.chinese: 一個朋友正準備去看望你很熟悉的一個女孩子。

sentences.english: It is useless for a girl to quarrel with fate because she is not a boy.
sentences.chinese: 女孩子因自己非男孩而自怨命苦是無用的。

sentences.english: The drowning girl shouted for help.
sentences.chinese: 那個溺水的女孩子大聲呼救。

sentences.english: The sculptor figured the girl in clay.
sentences.chinese: 雕塑家用粘土塑造了這個女孩子的形象。
小小說，“給這女孩子發獎。

sentences.english: The female kid smiles very a color color.
The girl aped the way the movie star fixed her hair.
sentences.chinese: 這女孩子模仿影星的髮式。

sentences.english: Imes picked Rose from all the beautiful girls in the school to be a model.
sentences.chinese: 艾姆斯從全校那些美麗的女孩子中選中露絲做模特兒。

sentences.english: As if attending to these curst cocks and hens here were not enough work for any girl.
sentences.chinese: 好像照看這些公雞和母雞還不夠一個女孩子忙的。

sentences.english: That big-eyed girl is my sister.
sentences.chinese: 那個大眼睛的女孩子是我的妹妹。

sentences.english: You know, girls of my age fancy sports car these days.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，現在像我這麼大的女孩子都在開跑車。

sentences.english: We have seven children in my family. All sisters, excepting me.
sentences.chinese: 我們家有七個小孩，除了我之外都是女孩子。

sentences.english: The girl in red in the snowfield is very conspicuous.
sentences.chinese: 那個在雪地裏穿着紅衣服的女孩子特別引人注目。

sentences.english: Ladies, try sleeping with coconut oil on your face at night.
sentences.chinese: 女孩子們可在臉上塗抹椰子油入睡。

sentences.english: Really? I thought your hobby was chasing girls.
sentences.chinese: 真的嗎？我還以爲你的愛好是追女孩子呢。

definition: erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]
erhua variant of 男孩[nan2 hai2]
